Shadowforged guardians are created through the intricate and dangerous process of siphoning penumbral energies and matter from the [Shadow Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=11) and then binding them to a physical skeleton of wood and metal. The first shadowforged guardians were created thousands of years ago in Nidal and were usually crafted in the likeness of that nation's patron deity, [Zon-Kuthon](/Deities.aspx?ID=20). Shadowforged guardians are understandably in high demand; unfortunately, only the person who speaks a special word or phrase at the moment of the construct's creation can command it. Those who know the hidden formula to craft these constructs guard the secret well and only a few shadowcasters deign to create these guardians on another person's behalf—for a hefty price. **[Recall Knowledge - Construct](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)): DC 32 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 30 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 27 [Shadowforged Guardian](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2084) **Source** [Pathfinder #183: Field of Maidens](/Sources.aspx?ID=145) pg. 84 **Perception** +18; [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +23 **Str** +7 **Dex** +5 **Con** +3 **Int** -5 **Wis** +0 **Cha** -5 **Eager Shadows** The shadowforged guardian increases all of its Speeds by 30 feet during the first round of combat after rolling initiative. --- **AC** 29 **Fort** +19 **Ref** +21 **Will** +14 **HP** 170 **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9), [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15), [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) attacks, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) **Resistances** [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27) 10, physical 10 (except [adamantine](/Equipment.aspx?ID=374)) **Weaknesses** slashing 10 **Induction Word** Each shadowforged guardian is activated during creation by a special word or short phrase spoken by its creator, and hearing this induction word resets its functions. If the guardian hears a creature within 30 feet utter its induction word, the guardian must succeed at a DC 26 Will save or become [stunned 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36) (stunned 3 on a critical failure). Regardless of the result of this save, it's immune to utterances of its induction word until the end of its next turn.
**Twilight Aura** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [illusion](/Traits.aspx?ID=92), [occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [shadow](/Traits.aspx?ID=143)) 30 feet. The shadowforged guardian's presence dims light and brightens shadows to a strange, twilit half-light. Light can't emanate brighter than [dim light](/Rules.aspx?ID=408) in this area while [darkness](/Rules.aspx?ID=409) is simultaneously illuminated to dim light. The shadowy aura automatically attempts to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) any 5th-level or lower magical [light](/Traits.aspx?ID=100) or [darkness](/Traits.aspx?ID=39) effect brought into this aura or created in this area (counteract check +21, 5th level). As long as the guardian is in dim light, it gains a fly Speed of 30 feet. --- **Speed** 30 feet, fly 30 feet in dim light **Melee** claw +23 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 2d8+11 slashing plus 1d6 cold and [Push](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=25) **Shadow Breath** ([Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [Shadow](/Traits.aspx?ID=143)) The shadowforged guardian expels a 30-foot cone of twisting shadows from its mouth. All creatures in the area must attempt a DC 29 Fortitude save. The guardian can't use Shadow Breath for 1d4 rounds.
**Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Success** The creature is [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) until the end of its next turn.
**Failure** The creature is enfeebled 1 for 1 hour and [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) for 1 minute.
**Critical Failure** The creature is enfeebled 2 for 24 hours and slowed 2 for 1 minute.
Feral Guardians Once created, a shadowforged guardian is entirely loyal to its creator, who must utter an induction word during the process of creation to secure their permanent control over the mindless construct.
